11.content: Who shrinks first and foremost.
11.title: dragonball

1111.content:
Goku like usual kept diligent in his training, punching and kicking at a wooden pole and causing many marks into it as he gave it his all, to the right of him was a pile of the things he broke already. He used his monkey tail to launch himself into it once again and it broke. He smiled to himself before a mysterious light casts over him blinding the saiyan child. Awakening he was smaller, much smaller.

Chi chi hits him with light from her helmet

Bulma's gadget shrinks him down

Someone else? Maybe Mai?
1111.title: Mystery light

choices: Chi chi punishes him for training again.
1113.content: Goku was finally resting in a home for him and chichi, all the adventures were over and although chichi was beginning to turn out strict, they began to settle in nicely as a married couple. Piccolo wasn't causing any trouble and Bulma and the others began to have nice lives on their own, but soon that would probably change.
1113.title: Goku after dragonball

goten wakes up and sees that everything is bigger and goten comes to the conclusion that he has shrunk to less than an inch tall somehow. goten climbs down from his bed and walks around the house, then he heard his mom talking to someone, it was bulma.


'yes, how long did you say it would take for the potion to work' asked chi chi. bulma replied 'well it took an hour for it to work on trunks'. goten sees trunks rubbing his mothers beautiful feet an almost throwing up quite a few times. 'so goten will do all of this for me when he shrunk' chi chi asks bulma. 'well i don't think he will have much of a choice, and if he refuses it's alright to stamp on him a few times to show him who's boss'
